author: Jeff Geerling
description:
Is a Raspberry Pi more expensive, slower, and less efficient than a mini PC?

And here are links to products I mentioned in this video (as an Amazon Associate, I earn for qualifying purchases):

  - GMKtec G3 Plus test data: https://github.com/geerlingguy/sbc-reviews/issues/64
  - Raspberry Pi 5 test data: https://github.com/geerlingguy/sbc-reviews/issues/21
  - GMKtec G3 Plus green: 8+256: https://amzn.to/4h40vnW ($129.99 after discount)
  - GMKtec G3 Plus black 16+512: https://amzn.to/4jop14Q ($158.49 after discount)
  - GMKtec G3 Plus black 16+1T: https://amzn.to/4hnx683 ($194 after discount)

GMKtec also emailed me and sent over code GMKJG10 for $10 off a barebones kit, if you buy from their website: https://www.gmktec.com/products/nucbox-g3-plus-enhanced-performance-mini-pc-with-intel-n150-processor

Note: I do not participate in any affiliate program with GMKtec, nor did they pay anything for this video (besides providing the NucBox G3 Plus I tested and reviewed). See my sponso
title: When did Raspberry Pis get so expensive?
